name: Tim Schweizer
text: If you like hot and fresh come to this location

name: Cameron Woodard
text: 2 1/2 hours from start to finish. 1 wrong pizza. Both cold. 10 of the 28 minutes on hold was driving to the store 18 standing there listening to their phone ring. Nobody could be bothered. Got my $20 back and went to Little Caesars.

name: Kim Spence
text: Like their curbside Service  most of the time. They are getting better.   Sometimes, lack of manpower causes some delay in curbside service.

name: Scotty Miller
text: Pizza üçï hut has not let me down yet

name: Lilly Leu
text: Tyler Leu is soo helpful and the crew making the pizzas are so nice! And Matt is an amazing cook too

name: Jessica McCullough
text: Made my special order pizza just right. Was very goodüëç

name: Andrea Kern
text: Worst pizza we have ever got from this location.  And we order from this location all the time . Very disappointed and they would not even do anything about it . Quite upset about it , might even stop getting from them and do Pizza Hut around the conner from now on .. sad

name: Beverly Echols
text: Love the Meat Lover's thin crust

name: Jeremy Rylee
text: A walk in food order. Was met with a nice and knowledgeable staff member and our small order was done fast. Thanks guys! I'll be back again soon.

name: Frank Evans
text: I'm guessing kitchen help aka the guy making the pizzas doesn't have to wear a face covering or even a hair net.

name: Ree Pickering
text: I ordered the Pizzone. Looked good, and tasted good. Was only able to eat half. Saved the other side for later. I heated it up in the oven to crisp it up. Got half way through that half and all the meat disappeared. And was left with bread crust. Not going to eat that again. Disappointed

name: Denisha Malveaux
text: Best Bbq wings!

name: Shannon Hanes
text: Good food great service

name: Sagey Ross
text: Overcharged me and then managed Robert refused to reimburse me. 7th street Texarkana location.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
text: They have the best cheese stuffed crust pizza

name: Curtis Castor
text: Pretty fast...pizza was nice and hot.

name: Aaron Smith

name: John Hanson
text: Great Pizza for a good price. Great staff!

name: tammi popw
text: Love our Pizza Hut

name: Felicia Davis
text: I love their service. Pizza still the best in town! Not everyone will be satisfied. But, hey that's life!

name: Kevin Murphy
text: Can't complain about the food itself but ordered delivery at 9:00pm and it's now 11:10pm and still not here. Don't think they are even going to deliver it at this hour. Pretty furious at this point!!

name: Julian Burchette
text: Ordered 3 pizzas and wings for my family online, the online service stated that the pizza would be delivered at 11:05 (actual time was 9:45) called the pizza hut to verify my order and time, and was confirmed that it would be 11-11:15 ‚Ä¶More

name: Lana Roberts
text: Called to place order.  Went in to get an order to go. Waited 15 minutes with no one in restaurant and was ignored. Went to Little Caesar instead

name: Jeremy Howard
text: Good customer service!

name: Tammy McWilliams
text: They usually get my order correct

name: Richard Johnson
text: As always met with a smile and a thank you for your business great experience

name: Nina Arnold
text: I ordered online at 655pm. The order stated it would be ready at 710pm. I waited until 750.... still no pizza with several people also waiting.  My mother went back at 830pm and said it was ready at 810pm.  If they can't handle the orders they need some people up there who can.  HIGHLY DISSATISFIED

name: Bonnie Heer
text: Needs a lot help with their food and management.

name: Lorenzo Lockett
text: I really enjoyed the pizza there, thks

name: Scooter Griffith
text: It was the fastest service I've ever seen, 12.5 minutes. Extremely amazed. I'm glad I called "The Hut" for my delivery. Their thin crust meat pie (pizza) is my favorite. I tip my hat to you Pizza Hut of Atlanta, Texas.

name: Angel Hushelpeck
text: Clean and went at perfect time for daughter's to spend time together

name: SANDRA KENNEDY
text: This place is fast and makes good pizza. If we've ever had a problem they are quick to fix it or give credit for our next visit.

name: Erica White
text: Best pizza for the price. Love the app to earn free pizza

name: ruby hamilton
text: Employees were great sat forever said it would be 15 minutes and took an hour food was good just slow

name: Dean Cole
text: The last four Supreme pizzas I ordered from them only had half the toppings they used to put on there as recently as three months ago. Something has changed there over the past couple months. When I called to inquire about the obvious lack ‚Ä¶More

name: Allison Willard
text: Called in for a delivery, literally 6 miles down the road, and even with address of RV park person could not figure out if they could deliver. Gave up and said I would pick up.  Pizza had no flavor and crust was like cardboard. Shame on you Pizza Hut, your pizzas are usually good.

name: Ridgell Rod
text: Waited an extra 25 min for my order only to get home and the wings were old as I am... The cashier and her coworker (not sure of their name)  acted as if they were made for screwing up my order.  I asked to see the manager "MARY" and she acted as if it was no big deal..  I will not be back and I wouldn't recommend them to anyone.

name: Janet Simmons
text: Great pizza, it's hard to understand what you ordered online.

name: debbie mccauley
text: Best pizza.  Fast and friendly.

name: Kassey Murphy
text:
Very poor customer service. Manager is rude.
Staff is rude. I would not recommend anyone eat there.

name: Thelma Bostick
text: Pizza was good but I didn't receive one of the drinks that I ordered. Cheese sticks were overcooked. The time before that the pizza was overcooked.

name: Ashley Young
text: I love their pizza

name: tailor peintner
text: Wow!!!! Your pizza is great!!!!! We haven't ate it in years but sure glad we tried you again! Thanks a lot!!!

name: workn' man
text: Pizza is ALWAYS ready when they told me it would be. Fast, hard-working employees. Good job, guys!

name: Mary Petty
text: Great experience. Good people Good food

name: Tracy Adams
text: Best pizza I have had in a long time.

name: Mary LaFayette
text: Nice staff

name: J Palm
text: When I say I want naked wings ,,I mean with no breading, like everywhere else in the world. And if I say chicken wings,that means it's got a f--king bone in it. Don't bring me breaded chicken nuggets and tell me it's a chicken wing. ‚Ä¶More

name: Marshall Nichols
text: I did not get the night manager name. He a great guy. I mean absolutely GREAT Customer Service. I'm a truck driver. I was having a bad night until I went in Pizza Hut.

name: jarvis young
text: The managers there really don't have a clue of what's going on.. Talking about Grant ..... But They really do have good service when Other Managers work.

name: Steve Foster
text: Love there pizza and they are fast

name: Taylor Parker
text: Always a quick and easy order has the most deals

name: A. C. Williams
text: Best pizzas

name: Kenneth Bradley
text: I'm not big on pizza hut, just wanted something different they was having a bad night kept messing up and frustrated but it's all good

name: Colleen Roberts
text: Order online for great deals

name: Queen Saxy
text: The best pizza hut around for carry out!

name: David Reeves
text: Awful service. Will be taking my business to dominos. Call center is a joke.

name: Donna Yeldell
text: It's Pizza Hut, but a little better than average.  They have good service because they have good employees.

name: Zach Hatfield
text: The female Hispanic manager at this location  is completely incompetent and has no business in food service.... I was left on hold for 1 hour.... our order was completely wrong and her attitude towards the situation was indifferent and pathetic.... she should be fired or learn how to do her job likke an adult!!!

name: Amanda Bowhall
text: This is a pick up and go location. Not very fast during most popular pizza nights or hours.

name: SHAREE BRYANT
text: Love the app to order my meal.

name: Erik Lentz
text: They often don't seem to take a lot of the online order coupons, which is frustrating, and I feel like the prices could be cheaper for what we get, but the pizza always tastes great and is ready on time.

name: Alex Domokos
text: It was ok

name: Brian Slaten
text: Need more toppings and fresher dough

name: Bridget Butler
text: We order from here all the time! They deliver, and the pizza is always good, hot and fresh!!

name: David Harris
text: Pizza was cold, stuffed crust lacked cheese. It's hit or miss with this place, very inconsistent.

text: Pizza Hut is always on point and and truly stand by what they say if they mess up they correct the error that's what keeps me coming back to them
